Psalms__148.1: Praise ye the Lord from the heavens: praise ye him in the high places.
Psalms__148.2: Praise ye him, all his angels: praise ye him, all his hosts.
Psalms__148.3: Praise ye him, O sun and moon: praise him, all ye stars and light.
Psalms__148.4: Praise him, ye heavens of heavens: and let all the waters that are above the heavens
Psalms__148.5: Praise the name of the Lord. For he spoke, and they were made: he commanded, and they were created.
Psalms__148.6: He hath established them for ever, and for ages of ages: he hath made a decree, and it shall not pass away.
Psalms__148.7: Praise the Lord from the earth, ye dragons, and all ye deeps:
Psalms__148.8: Fire, hail, snow, ice, stormy winds which fulfill his word:
Psalms__148.9: Mountains and all hills, fruitful trees and all cedars:
Psalms__148.10: Beasts and all cattle: serpents and feathered fowls:
Psalms__148.11: Kings of the earth and all people: princes and all judges of the earth:
Psalms__148.12: Young men and maidens: let the old with the younger, praise the name of the Lord:
Psalms__148.13: For his name alone is exalted.
Psalms__148.14: The praise of him is above heaven and earth: and he hath exalted the horn of his people. A hymn to all his saints: to the children of Israel, a people approaching to him. Alleluia.
